text: Need Andrew Clark for Boost Juice campaign. Budget around $9,376, looking for 1 x Instagram story, 3 x Radio interview, 3 x Instagram post, 2 x Product launch event, 3 x Product photography. 12 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 12 months. Engagement period: 2 months. Need to confirm: exclusivity period
